creditline: Gift of Winton and Janet Jones, Ruth and Bruce Dayton, the Harriet Hanley Estate, the Print and Drawing Council, and John E. Andrus III
inscription:
SIDE A: PROSE DU TRANSSIBERIEN ET DE LA PETITE JEHANNE DE FRANCE / REPRESENTATION synchrome / PEINTURE  simultane TEXTE / Mme DELAUNAY-TERK BLAISE CENDRARS

SIDE B: PREMIER LIVRE SIMULTANE
medium: Color pochoir (stenciled watercolor) and relief print on paper (double-sided)
provenance: [Ursus Rare Books, New York]; sold to MIA, 2001.
title: Prospectus for "La Prose du Transsibérien et de la petite Jehanne de France"
